climbs.name: She Sells Sea Shells
climbs.fa: Dave Martin and Aaron Rashaw Fall 1999

content.description: Follow a white streak just left of center on the formation past 13 bolts to chains.  Approximately 130 feet.  Walk off or use 2 ropes to rap.
content.location:
This route is located on a north-facing triangle shaped formation above

Rocket Reef

on

Grandeur Peak

.  The white streak is just left of center, that is what the route follows. It is easy to spot from below.  The hike is murder, prepare to self medicate if you get motivated.

climbs.name: Mocha Salsa
climbs.fa: Dave Martin and Aaron Rashaw spring 2000

content.description: OK moves past 4 bolts to the chains. The 2nd or 3rd clip might be dangerous if you blow the clip?
content.location:
This route is located uphill past

Rocket Reef

on some smaller limestone.

content.description: Pitch #1: Steep broken up limestone past many bolts to a two-bolt belay with some occasional memorable moves. Requires some agro aggressive maneuvers to reach the chains.
content.location:
As noted, on the

Upper Reef

. Should be easy to locate on the prow of the WSW Face.

Rappel the route.
